last_episode_to_air.name: Commitment
last_episode_to_air.overview: It is all out war as Chandler must face his fears and confront the greatest threat he has ever encountered.

name: The Last Ship
overview: Their mission is simple: Find a cure. Stop the virus. Save the world. When a global pandemic wipes out eighty percent of the planet's population, the crew of a lone naval destroyer must find a way to pull humanity from the brink of extinction.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The crew of a naval destroyer is forced to confront the reality of a new existence when a pandemic kills off most of the earth's population.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season Two begins with a cure for the Red Virus and the goal to save the human race. Navy Captain Tom Chandler and his crew return to the States unsure of what they will find. As the crew seeks to find survivors and their families, they encounter a new, emerging enemy who’s vying for control and may hinder the mass production of the cure.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The crew of the Nathan James is shifting their attention to Asia after President Michener hears rumblings that the Chinese leader has been hoarding the "Scott cure" instead of distributing it to the people in the region. Michener sends Chandler to a global summit to investigate this allegation, as well as rumors of a possible mutation of the original virus that has caused a fresh outbreak in Japan.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After the chilling events at the end of last season, Tom Chandler has given up his heroic titles and responsibilities and sought solace – and anonymity -- with his family in a small fishing village in Greece. Meanwhile, Captain Slattery and the crew of Nathan James have discovered that the virus has “jumped kingdoms” and now infects the world’s food crops, bringing humanity to the brink of global famine. As the ship traverses the Mediterranean in search of a solution that can save the world's food supply, Chandler encounters his own enemies in Greece. His “hero’s journey” becomes a modern day retelling of Homer’s Odyssey.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: In season five, the world is finally recovering from the deadly virus that decimated the population, but global political unrest still remains. Tom Chandler has retired and his former crew has scattered. Sasha Cooper, Lieutenant Danny Green, SBS WO-N Wolf Taylor and Sergeant Azima Kandie are on a covert mission in Panama. When they are wrongly blamed for an attack on the Panamanian President, the consequences for the United States are dire. The Nathan James must fight to prevent invasion by Latin America and the next world war.

episodes.name: Phase Six
episodes.overview: The crew of a lone naval ship try to save humanity when they discover a deadly virus has wiped out most of the population in the series premiere of this drama.

episodes.name: Welcome to Gitmo
episodes.overview: The crew members arrive at the Guantanamo Bay military base to collect food, fuel and medical supplies. When they come under attack by escaped Gitmo prisoners, they team up with a gruff private contractor to push back against the offensive.

episodes.name: Dead Reckoning
episodes.overview: The crew faces a new foe targeting Rachel and her research, leading Chandler to engage in a series of dangerous strategic maneuvers.

episodes.name: We'll Get There
episodes.overview: Chandler's leadership is put to the test when the ship's propulsion system is in danger of breaking down, the crew becomes overworked and exhausted, and Dr. Scott could potentially lose all of her research on the virus.

episodes.name: El Toro
episodes.overview: With Rachel close to a breakthrough on her vaccine, she, Chandler and XO Slattery lead a small team into the jungles of Nicaragua on a mission to find monkeys for her vaccine trials. While there, they find much more than they bargained for when they run across a former drug kingpin who will stop at nothing to maintain his stranglehold on his oppressed society. Chandler and his men find themselves in a huge moral dilemma over whether to eliminate this menace or take what they need and continue on with their mission.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: After returning from the horrors of Nicaragua, panic begins to spread throughout the ship when Lt. Danny Green comes down with a mysterious illness that could be the virus. Losing faith in Rachel and her failing vaccine trials, Chandler now has to deal with a restive crew. If he fails to keep the crew together, the whole mission is in jeopardy.

episodes.name: SOS
episodes.overview: After picking up a distress call near Jamaica, Chandler and a small team stage a rescue attempt. But a surprise attack leave Chandler and Tex stranded at sea. Slattery and the crew search desperately to find their lost at sea Captain and his comrade, hoping to do so before their enemies beat them to it.

episodes.name: Two Sailors Walk Into a Bar...
episodes.overview: With Chandler and Tex caught in a dangerous situation, Slattery has to step into the role as commanding officer. Torn between a mission with the fate of the world at stake and a Captain (and friend) in danger, Slattery has to find a way to get his people back without losing the most important asset: the vaccine prototype.

episodes.name: Trials
episodes.overview: Rachel and Chandler ask for six volunteers to participate in human trials of her vaccine, but the tests could be a living hell as the virus and the vaccine do battle inside their bodies. Meanwhile back in the States, Chandler’s wife and father are doing everything they can to keep their family alive.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Chandler and his crew finally returns home, where a former D.C. power player is fending off a dangerous warlord who threatens her hopes of restoring law and order in society. Now with a location and a means to finalize their mission, Chandler sets out to save his dying family, only to discover something absolutely terrifying about this brave new world.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The crew of a naval destroyer is forced to confront the reality of a new existence when a pandemic kills off most of the earth's population.

episodes.name: Unreal City
episodes.overview: After the horrifying revelations and reversals of fortune in Baltimore, Chandler and his fractured team join forces with an underground resistance in an attempt to defeat Amy Granderson. With doses of the cure running low, Rachel tries to do some good for the sick while remaining a prisoner at Avocet. Meanwhile, Slattery and the crew of Nathan James are in a race against time to save an injured Dr. Tophet and regain control of their ship.

episodes.name: Fight the Ship
episodes.overview: After the horrifying revelations and reversals of fortune in Baltimore, Chandler and his fractured team join forces with an underground resistance in an attempt to defeat Amy Granderson. With doses of the cure running low, Rachel tries to do some good for the sick while remaining a prisoner at Avocet. Meanwhile, Slattery and the crew of Nathan James are in a race against time to save an injured Dr. Tophet and regain control of their ship.

episodes.name: It's Not a Rumor
episodes.overview: Nathan James returns home to Norfolk on a mission. With his family now safely aboard the James, Chandler sends his crew in search of their friends and loved ones.

episodes.name: Solace
episodes.overview: The crew of Nathan James discovers that hospital ship USNS Solace was sent to sea to wait for Dr. Scott's cure. Captain Chandler sees an opportunity to add another ship to their fleet while Rachel is eager to find a lab better equipped to replicate the vaccine. When Solace fails to respond to radio communications, Chandler and his team board the ship...and come face-to-face with an unexpected enemy.

episodes.name: Achilles
episodes.overview: With a small group of survivors from Solace in tow, Chandler and his crew square off against an enemy of the most dangerous kind - a nuclear-powered submarine led by rogue British naval officers, Sean and Ned Ramsey. XO Slattery interrogates a captured mercenary from the hospital ship in an effort to extract information on the sub and its mission. As Nathan James engages in a perilous game of cat-and- mouse, the truth about the mercenary sub unfolds.

episodes.name: Long Day's Journey
episodes.overview: Chandler tracks a new threat to Northern Florida. Meanwhile, Rachel comes across a secret formula that her mentor, Dr. Hunter, had been perfecting.

episodes.name: Alone and Unafraid
episodes.overview: While XO Slattery struggles to evade a submarine, Chandler and his team infiltrate a compound on land.

episodes.name: Safe Zone
episodes.overview: Still trying to piece together Dr. Hunter's lost formula, Rachel grapples with her sworn enemy's presence on board the Nathan James.

episodes.name: Uneasy Lies the Head
episodes.overview: With Dr. Scott on the verge of a breakthrough, Chandler and his team set out to land in search of much needed supplies and materials for her lab.

episodes.name: Friendly Fire
episodes.overview: Rachel is hard at work on a new, more efficient version of the cure while Alisha decodes a message found on a recovered cell phone.

episodes.name: Valkyrie
episodes.overview: After a message is broadcast implicating the Navy in a devastating disaster, Chandler looks to infiltrate the network and regain the trust of the American people.

episodes.name: Cry Havoc
episodes.overview: Nathan James finds itself trapped between the submarine and civilian blockades.

episodes.name: A More Perfect Union
episodes.overview: With their mission now fully dedicated to spreading the cure, Nathan James puts a call out to civilians to meet at pre-selected ports across the country.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season Two begins with a cure for the Red Virus and the goal to save the human race. Navy Captain Tom Chandler and his crew return to the States unsure of what they will find. As the crew seeks to find survivors and their families, they encounter a new, emerging enemy who’s vying for control and may hinder the mass production of the cure.

episodes.name: The Scott Effect
episodes.overview: CNO Tom Chandler is sent to Asia to investigate a possible mutation of the Red Flu. Captain Slattery and his crew deliver cure to Southeast Asia but there may be an unexpected threat in the region.

episodes.name: Rising Sun
episodes.overview: Chandler must find a way to return to his old crew and investigate a dangerous new foe.

episodes.name: Shanzhai
episodes.overview: Chandler and crew race to find answers in an Asian Dodge City. Slattery begins to unravel the truth about his troubling predicament.

episodes.name: Devil May Care
episodes.overview: Chandler must confront his suspected new foe. Slattery learns more about the supposed virus mutation. Pressure mounts on President Michener as the situation worsens.

episodes.name: Minefield
episodes.overview: Chandler's mission becomes complicated as his position is worsened. President Michener faces pressure from the regional leaders.

episodes.name: Dog Day
episodes.overview: Chandler's mission comes to a head as he prepares the final part of his plan. President Michener ponders the fate of his presidency.

episodes.name: In the Dark
episodes.overview: The Nathan James must evade an overwhelming threat. A revelation in St. Louis puts President Michener in a terrible position.

episodes.name: Sea Change
episodes.overview: America copes with tragedy while Chandler further investigates the possible virus mutation.

episodes.name: Paradise
episodes.overview: Chandler gets a lead that could help answer threatening questions. Kara does some digging in the White House.

episodes.name: Scuttle
episodes.overview: Chandler finds himself making a difficult decision when an order comes in from the White House.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: Chandler faces his powerful enemy in a final showdown. Kara joins someone that can help with her mission.

episodes.name: Resistance
episodes.overview: Chandler returns to America to find out what has really been happening.

episodes.name: Don't Look Back
episodes.overview: The fight for America comes to an end; Chandler faces a challenge that could change his life forever.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The crew of the Nathan James is shifting their attention to Asia after President Michener hears rumblings that the Chinese leader has been hoarding the "Scott cure" instead of distributing it to the people in the region. Michener sends Chandler to a global summit to investigate this allegation, as well as rumors of a possible mutation of the original virus that has caused a fresh outbreak in Japan.

episodes.name: In Medias Res
episodes.overview: Sixteen months after thwarting the coup in America, Nathan James must face yet another global disaster. The question remains, where in the world is Tom Chandler?

episodes.name: The Pillars of Hercules
episodes.overview: Having lost their only lead, the crew of Nathan James continues their search for an item that could save the world. Chandler immerses himself in a mission for revenge.

episodes.name: Bread and Circuses
episodes.overview: Nathan James's crew searches for a precious item leading them to a strange place of opulence and violence where they cross paths with a most unexpected ally.

episodes.name: Nostos
episodes.overview: The crew searches for one of their own as enemies close in on all sides. Slattery is haunted by visions of the past.

episodes.name: Allegiance
episodes.overview: Nathan James is diverted from their mission when they receive a suspicious distress call from a fishing trawler.

episodes.name: Tempest
episodes.overview: With an enormous storm on the horizon, Nathan James must navigate an equally terrifying threat in order to make it to safety.

episodes.name: Feast
episodes.overview: The search continues with a reconnaissance mission but things turn violent when an old foe resurfaces.

episodes.name: Lazaretto
episodes.overview: An undercover mission in the land of the dead leads to disturbing revelations about Dr. Vellek's sinister plans.

episodes.name: Detect, Deceive, Destroy
episodes.overview: The crew of Nathan James faces a threat that will test the limits of their Naval tactics and strategies.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.overview: Chandler confronts his enemy — and his personal demons — in a final showdown, with the fate of humanity on the line.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: After the chilling events at the end of last season, Tom Chandler has given up his heroic titles and responsibilities and sought solace – and anonymity -- with his family in a small fishing village in Greece. Meanwhile, Captain Slattery and the crew of Nathan James have discovered that the virus has “jumped kingdoms” and now infects the world’s food crops, bringing humanity to the brink of global famine. As the ship traverses the Mediterranean in search of a solution that can save the world's food supply, Chandler encounters his own enemies in Greece. His “hero’s journey” becomes a modern day retelling of Homer’s Odyssey.

episodes.name: Casus Belli
episodes.overview: Three years after overcoming the global famine, the United States Navy is ready to unveil its first fully functional fleet since the Red Flu pandemic, but a new type of threat may mean the next world war.

episodes.name: Fog of War
episodes.overview: Thrust back to World War II era military technology, Nathan James must think fast to survive a fight with limited weapons capabilities.

episodes.name: El Puente
episodes.overview: With nations being rapidly occupied, Chandler tries his hand at diplomacy to unite two hostile countries so they can fight a common enemy.

episodes.name: Tropic of Cancer
episodes.overview: As Nathan James and her allies attempt to prevent the enemy moving north, Chandler's haunting visions manifest into reality.

episodes.name: Warriors
episodes.overview: After months of fighting, the crew of Nathan James must embark on a dangerous mission to secure important intel that could decide the fate of the war.

episodes.name: Air Drop
episodes.overview: Nathan James must seek the aid of a prominent rebel leader in order to create a staging area before mounting an invasion of their own.

episodes.name: Somos la Sangre
episodes.overview: Pinned down after days of fighting, Vulture team must find their way into a secretive enemy camp.

episodes.name: Honor
episodes.overview: With a devastating hostage situation occurring back home, Chandler must devise the perfect plan to avoid losing everything.

episodes.name: Courage
episodes.overview: The crew of Nathan James begin preparations for what may be their most ambitious mission to date.

episodes.name: Commitment
episodes.overview: It is all out war as Chandler must face his fears and confront the greatest threat he has ever encountered.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: In season five, the world is finally recovering from the deadly virus that decimated the population, but global political unrest still remains. Tom Chandler has retired and his former crew has scattered. Sasha Cooper, Lieutenant Danny Green, SBS WO-N Wolf Taylor and Sergeant Azima Kandie are on a covert mission in Panama. When they are wrongly blamed for an attack on the Panamanian President, the consequences for the United States are dire. The Nathan James must fight to prevent invasion by Latin America and the next world war.
